Belgium:
Sack of Antwerp by Spanish mutineers from the Army of Flanders.
Pacification of Ghent: alliance of the provinces of the Habsburg Netherlands to drive mutineers from the Army of Flanders from the country and promote a peace treaty with the rebellious provinces Holland and Zeeland.
Chile: The dam of San Pedro River burst flooding many settlements downstream including Valdivia.
China: The Pagoda of Cishou Temple was built.
Poland: Coronation of Stephen Batory and Anna Jagiellon
